YSPH = #{ysph,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCBZ = #{scbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into SC_SX (SXBH, YSPH, SCBZ, SCRQ, SBBH, GH, FXZL, SBZK, SXZL, SXSD, SFQX, SFDQ, ZDR, ZDRQ, SHR, SHRQ, gqcd, yl, lsrate, MPSH, ZLH, ISrise, ischange, sxts, color, PJ, XJ, SHRQH, LastUpdateTime, LastUpdateAccountId) values
(#{item.sxbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ysph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.sbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fxzl,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.sbzk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sxzl,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.sxsd,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.sfqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sfdq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gqcd,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.yl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lsrate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.mpsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isrise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.ischange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sxts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shrqh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastupdateaccountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from SC_SX sc where sc.YSPH = #{mainDiskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT isnull(sum(ISNULL(CD, 0) + ISNULL(DQCD, 0) + ISNULL(QGCD, 0)), 0) as totallen FROM SC_SX2 T1 INNER JOIN SC_SX T2 ON T1.SXBH = T2.SXBH where T2.YSPH = #{mainDiskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
select SXBH from SC_SX where YSPH = #{ysph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
